Package ides.api.utilities

Class Summary
ContractableTextArea This text area can be used inside scroll panes that may be sized down.
EscapeDialog A class which extends JDialog with the capability to handle the event of the user pressing the Escape key.
GeneralUtils A collection of methods and classes of general utility.
GeneralUtils.JOptionPaneKeyBinder This class allows the use of simple keyboard shortcuts for the Yes/No/etc.
GeneralUtils.JOptionPaneKeyBinder.ShortcutHandler Handler for the activation of the simplified custom shortcuts.
HeadTailInputStream Wrapper for InputStreams which allows the prefixing of the stream with a header and the appending of a tail to the stream.
